HomePage.heroText: Powerful mass SMS mailing for effective communication with your audience

SmsServiseCard.title_1: Creation and management of SMS mailing
SmsServiseCard.title_2: Alpha name of the sender of the SMS message
SmsServiseCard.title_3: Reports on the delivery of your messages
SmsServiseCard.title_4: Creation and editing of subscriber groups
SmsServiseCard.title_6: The service does not require installation
SmsServiseCard.description_1: You specify the text of the message, select the groups of subscribers who will receive the message, and specify the time when the messages will be sent to the recipients.
SmsServiseCard.description_2: You yourself choose a signature (sender's name), which will be displayed instead of the SMS sender's number.
SmsServiseCard.description_3: You can view the report of each SMS-Mailings online on the website or download it in a convenient format (Excel).
SmsServiseCard.description_4: You specify the text of the message, select the groups of subscribers who will receive the message, and specify the time when the messages will be sent to the recipients.
SmsServiseCard.description_5: You can send messages to subscribers of all Ukrainian mobile operators. Other countries are available upon request.
SmsServiseCard.description_6: You will be able to send SMS messages from any computer connected to the Internet using our site.

ServiceDescriptionList.description_1: This method has a personal character, because with the help of messages you deliver information directly to the client.
ServiceDescriptionList.description_2: Today, marketing is expanding its boundaries. If previously television and outdoor advertising were mainly used to advertise products and brands, now entrepreneurs have much more opportunities to make their products recognizable. A simple and affordable way to communicate with potential customers is SMS.
ServiceDescriptionList.description_3: SMS advertising will help make your brand recognizable. Of course, not all customers will respond to the first message, but most likely they will be interested in subsequent ones.
ServiceDescriptionList.description_4: SMS will help you find new customers and not lose old ones by notifying them about promotions, discounts and new offers. Buyers will be interested and want to learn more about your products and what you can offer them.

SliderAdvantages.textCard_1: Convenient and easy-to-use service management interface
SliderAdvantages.textCard_2: You only pay for delivered messages, subject to contract signing!
SliderAdvantages.textCard_3: A high opening rate of SMS messages is the most effective advertising tool.
SliderAdvantages.textCard_4: SMS mailings are the future of your business, its success and development.
SliderAdvantages.textCard_5_part_2: Fast, simple and reliable SMS service
SliderAdvantages.textCard_6: Happy birthday sms for regular customers

MailList.textUserNameBox: Choose a signature (Name of the sender) that will be displayed instead of the number of the sender of the SMS message
MailList.textAddAlfaNameFormBox: The name of the sender must be no more than 11 Latin characters
MailList.textSmsSendBox: Enter the SMS message. Watch the message size. Remember: for Cyrillic, one SMS can contain 70 characters, for Latin - 160 characters.
MailList.textRecipientsFormBox: Select the group of contacts to which you want to send an SMS message. You can enter a new number or select one of the contacts.
MailList.titleRecipientsForm: Groups and phone numbers to which the SMS message will be sent
MailList.footnoteForOfferContract: By clicking the Send button, you confirm that the form has been sent and that all the entered data is correct, as well as confirming that you have read the

GroupsPage.textPageBox: To get started, you need to create a new Contact Group and add numbers to it. You can add contact phone numbers from an Excel or text file.
GroupsPage.textExplanation: If you wish, you can view all your contacts

ClientsPage.textTurnBackButton: Return to the list of groups
ClientsPage.textPageBox: This table shows all your contacts. You can view detailed information and edit the contact.

EditPage.textTurnBackButton: Return to the list of groups
